title.text: Windows SharePoint Services Language Template Pack Service Pack 2 (KB887624)

description.text: Windows SharePoint Services Language Template Pack Service Pack 2 ensures that Windows SharePoint Services performs with full functionality when a Language Template Pack is installed.  This package services the following languages: Hindi, Thai, Bulgarian, Croatian, Estonian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Romanian, Serbian (Latin), Slovak, Slovenian, and Ukrainian. After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer. Once you have installed this item, it cannot be removed.
